NK100(the)006:1: // rdzogs chen gyi lo rgyus dang sdus don bzhugs //
NK100(the)006:2: bla ma me tri bas theg pa thams cad kyi yang rtse rdzogs chen gyi don ma rnyed nas /
NK100(the)006:3: pany+tsa b+hi ta thams cad kyi spyan sngar byon pas kyang ma rnyed nas 'dug pa las /
NK100(the)006:4: dam pa chos kyi lo rgyus las /
NK100(the)006:5: rgya gar gyi yul gyi shar phyogs na /
NK100(the)006:6: sh+aag kya thub pa'i sprul pa ri dwags kyi rgyal po ri pa bzhugs par gsan nas /
NK100(the)006:7: zla ba gcig gi bar du grong khyer dang ma bral bar byon /
NK100(the)006:8: zhag bdun du grong khyer dang bral nas byon pas /
NK100(the)006:9: zas skom ma rnyed pa las /
NK100(the)006:10: nags kyi gseb spyil po gcig gi nang nas skyes blo dong can gcig byung ba dang /
NK100(the)006:11: khyod la zas skom yod dam zhes dris pa las /
NK100(the)006:12: skyes pa na re dge slong sha gsol lam zhes dris pa las /
NK100(the)006:13: bla mas kyang 'tshal zhes smras pa dang /
NK100(the)006:14: skyes pas sha'i tshogs mang po bsad nas 'ongs pa dang /
NK100(the)006:15: ched du bsad pa'i sha nga mi za zhes smras pa dang /
NK100(the)006:16: skyes pas na re chos 'dod na lus gso dgos pas sha gsol zhes smras pa dang /
NK100(the)006:17: gsol du ma bzhed pas sha'i tshogs dang skyes pa dang spyil po yang gar song cha med do //
NK100(the)006:20: nam mkha' las da nga dang khyod 'phrad pa'i skal pa med kyis /
NK100(the)006:21: lho phyogs na nga'i slob ma rab tu byung ba
NK100(the)006:22: gcig yod kyis de la gdams ngag zhus zhes smras
NK100(the)006:23: pa dang / der rab tu byung ba des gdams ngag gnang ste /
NK100(the)006:24: dang po spu gra lta bu gnang /
NK100(the)006:25: de nas 'byung gi ye shes ma shar ba shar bya shar byed gnang /
NK100(the)006:26: de nas rtogs byed pa lta ba'i gdams ngag gnang /
NK100(the)006:27: de nas ye shes ngos bzung gnang /
NK100(the)006:28: de nas cog zhag ma gnang /
NK100(the)006:29: de nas nyams kyi man ngag gnang /
NK100(the)006:30: bla ma me tri ba chen pos /
NK100(the)006:31: slob dpon sh+ri seng nga la gnang /
NK100(the)006:32: des b+aee ro tsa na la gnang /
NK100(the)006:35: des ya zi bon ston la gnang /
NK100(the)006:37: des skong rab mtsho la gnang /
NK100(the)006:38: des gtam dar ma la gnang /
NK100(the)006:39: des byang chub rdo rje la /
NK100(the)006:40: des lce ba sgom sras pa la /
NK100(the)006:41: des spor chung ston pa la /
NK100(the)006:42: des dam pa shag rgyal la /
NK100(the)006:44: des sprul sku rin po che la /
NK100(the)006:45: des rta jo ye shes la /
NK100(the)006:46: des rta ston gzi brjid la /
NK100(the)006:48: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK100(the)006:49: byang chub kyi sems dbang rnam pa gsum bskur ba ni /
NK100(the)006:50: rgyal 'thabs spyi blugs kyi dbang dang /
NK100(the)006:51: rig pa rang gsal gyi dbang dang /
NK100(the)006:52: ye shes spyi blugs kyi dbang ngo //
NK100(the)006:53: rgyal thabs spyi blugs kyi dbang ni /
NK100(the)006:54: rgyal po rgyal sar 'don pa dang 'dra ste /
NK100(the)006:55: 'dus ma byas kyi nam mkha' la tshad zin pa /
NK100(the)006:58: bya ba gtang ba'i skyes bu lta bu /
NK100(the)006:60: nam mkha' la sprin dengs pa lta bu /
NK100(the)006:61: so so skye bo'i 'khrul snang lam log pa'o //
NK100(the)006:62: rig pa rang gsal gyi dbang ni /
NK100(the)006:63: zhugs mar rlung gis ma bskyod pa dang 'dra /
NK100(the)006:64: snga phyi bsre ba'i shes pa med pa /
NK100(the)006:65: dbang la phur pa gtab pa lta bu /
NK100(the)006:66: bya thi bya tshang du 'jug pa lta bu /
NK100(the)006:67: rgyal po'i btsun mo lta bu /
NK100(the)006:68: khang stong gi rkun mo lta bu /
NK100(the)006:70: ye shes spyi blugs kyi dbang ni /
NK100(the)006:72: chos nyid ji bzhin pa la tshad zin pa /
NK100(the)006:77: khyung nam mkha' la lding pa lta bu /
NK100(the)006:78: nor bu rin po che lta bu /
NK100(the)006:79: dug la sngags kyis btab pa lta bu /
NK100(the)006:80: dngos po'i gnas lugs ji bzhin pa'o //
